component.name: NowPlaying
component.script:
function init() m.top.backgroundUri = "" m.top.backgroundColor = "0x111111"
m.metadataTask = createObject("RoSGNode", "MetadataLoader")
m.metadataTask.observeField("artist", "updateArtist") m.metadataTask.observeField("title", "updateTitle") m.metadataTask.observeField("album", "updateAlbum")
m.metadataTask.control = "RUN" end function
function updateArtist() track = m.top.findNode("track") track.artist = m.metadataTask.artist end function
function updateTitle() track = m.top.findNode("track") track.title = m.metadataTask.title end function
function updateAlbum() track = m.top.findNode("track") track.album = m.metadataTask.album end function
